smart_goals.description: Maintain a daily sodium intake of no more than 1500mg for the next 3 months. Monitor sodium intake daily through diet records and adjust meals accordingly.
Reduce average daily heart rate below 80 bpm within 2 weeks by engaging in regular cardio exercises for 30 minutes every day. Monitor heart rate daily using a wearable device.
Improve sleep quality by achieving an average of 7 hours of sleep per night for the next month. Track sleep hours using a sleep tracker and adjust sleep habits accordingly.
